fullContentHtml:
Overview

The Horizontal Hose Coil Packaging Machine FPCA100 is engineered for high-efficiency, secure wrapping of hoses, cables, and similar coiled products. Utilizing stretch films like LLDPE, PE, or PVC, it ensures tight, protective packaging suitable for storage and transportation.

Key Specifications

Packaging Materials: LLDPE, PE, PVC

Coil Dimensions (OD/ID/Width): 80-100mm / 50mm / 70mm

Coil Weight Range: 8 - 50 kg

Packaging Speed: 18 - 35 seconds per piece

Turntable: Ø300-400mm, Width 100-200mm

Max Ring Speed: 100 rpm

Power Supply: 380V, 60Hz, 3-Phase

Control & Operation Features

  • Advanced Control: Equipped with PLC and HMI for precise operation; optional automatic material calculation.
  • Dual Mode Operation: Switch seamlessly between manual and automatic modes for maximum flexibility.
  • Speed & Tension Control: Inverter for adjustable ring/roller speed and a mechanical device for precise packaging tension.
  • Safety & Convenience: Features soft start/stop, safety guards, foot pedal jogging, and overcurrent protection.
  • Easy Adjustment: Support rollers and wrapping parameters are easily adjustable for different coil sizes (OD).

Packaging Performance

  • Horizontal Wrapping: Specifically designed for stable horizontal coil packaging.
  • Material Compatibility: Handles a wide range of stretch films for versatile application.
  • Consistent Quality: Integrated tensioning device ensures uniform, tight wraps from small to large coils.
  • Efficient Handling: Streamlined design facilitates easy loading/unloading of both coils and packaging material rolls.
  • Optional Accessories: Marking ring knock-off device available for specialized needs.

Note: This machine can be customized and designed according to specific customer requirements and specifications.

fullContentHtml:
Overview

The E300 is an automatic horizontal orbital stretch wrapping machine designed for securing long, flat, or horizontal-shaped items such as pipes, metal sheets, doors, floor boards, and aluminum profiles. It provides a tightly sealed, protective wrap that keeps items tidy and secure during storage or transit. The machine can be seamlessly integrated into existing packaging lines for fully automated operation.

Installation

The machine must be installed on a flat, hard surface with a ground load capacity exceeding 1 ton/m² to ensure stable and vibration-free operation.

Wrapping Station Features

  • Stable & Safe Operation: Ring and double-rub wheel design ensures smooth, stable, and energy-efficient wrapping.
  • Adjustable Friction: The friction between the driving wheels and the ring can be adjusted for optimal film grip.
  • Variable Speed: Ring rotation speed is adjustable via an inverter for different wrapping requirements.
  • Soft Start & Stop: Prevents film breakage and product disturbance.
  • Position Reset: Wrapping position can be easily reset for consistent cycles.
  • Tension Control: Packing material (film) tension is adjustable to suit different product types.
  • Material Compatibility: The material frame accommodates a wide range of wrapping films.
  • Safety Guardrail: Integrated protective guardrail ensures operator safety during operation.
  • Overlap Adjustment: Film overlap can be precisely set from 10% to 90%.

Conveyor System

  • Surface Protection: Conveyor design protects product surfaces from scratches or damage.
  • Automatic Handling: Includes automatic entry and exit conveyor systems for streamlined workflow.
  • Adjustable Conveyors: Conveyor positions and settings can be adjusted to fit different product dimensions.
  • Robust Drive: Conveyors are driven by motors with gearboxes for reliable performance.
  • Speed Control: Conveyor speed is adjustable via inverter to match wrapping cycle timing.

PLC Control System

  • Automated Operation: PLC and customizable programming allow the machine to perform automatic wrapping cycles based on specific packaging goals.
  • Precise Positioning: Photocell sensors are used to accurately set and detect the wrapping start/end positions.
  • Visual Indicators: Equipped with indicator lights and alarms for automatic status monitoring and fault alerts.

fullContentHtml:
The E200 Horizontal Stretch Wrapping Machine is a robust rotating ring system designed for efficient spiral wrapping of elongated products. Engineered with operator safety and production efficiency in mind, it features comprehensive safety guards and advanced automation controls.

Wrapping Station

  • Durable ring construction with a strong structure for long service life.
  • Special driving wheels ensure smooth and stable ring rotation.
  • Wrapping ring speed is fully adjustable from 10 to 120 RPM.
  • Soft start and stop functionality protects both product and film.
  • Automatic reset of the wrapping position for consistent cycles.
  • Advanced tension control suitable for both large and small objects.
  • Compatible with a wide range of flexible packaging materials.
  • All moving parts are covered by guardrails for safe operation.
  • Film overlap is precisely adjustable from 10% to 90%.

Conveyor System

  • Gentle conveyor design protects product surfaces during handling.
  • Integrated automatic entrance and outlet conveyor systems.
  • Conveyor adjustment function for different product sizes.
  • Conveyors are driven by a reliable motor with a gearbox.
  • Conveyor speed is easily adjustable via an inverter.

PLC Control System

  • Programmable Logic Controller (PLC) enables fully automatic wrapping cycles tailored to specific packing goals.
  • Photocell sensor ensures accurate and repeatable packing position setting.
  • Automatic indicator alarm activates immediately when a fault is detected, with clear trouble display.
  • Separate, user-friendly control panel simplifies both operation and maintenance.
  • Intuitive interface operation for easy setup and monitoring.

Automatic Cutter & Feeder (Mechanical Hand)

The integrated automatic cutter and feeder system (mechanical hand) completes the automated cycle, ensuring efficient film cutting and clamping for a seamless, hands-free operation.

The E200 combines durability, precision, and safety, making it an ideal solution for high-volume, automated packaging lines requiring reliable spiral wrapping of long or bulky items.
